chinese: 倒映；反映，仔细思考；反省
english: reflect

chinese: 群山倒映在水中。
english: The mountains are reflected in the water

chinese: n.得分；刻痕；二十 v.在…•上刻痕
english: score

chinese: 我们队以二比一的比分赢了这场比赛。
english: Our team won by a score of two to one

chinese: n.保护；保存；维持
english: conservation

chinese: 保护环境很重要。
english: Conservation of our environment is very important

chinese: adj.即席的，即兴的 adv.即席，即兴 n.即兴之作
english: impromptu

chinese: 他在七步之内即兴作了首诗。
english: He composed an impromptu poem within seven paces

chinese: v. 争吵
english: argue

chinese: 男孩在和妈妈争吵。
english: The boy is arguing with his mother

chinese: 以估价，估计 D.估价，估计
english: estimate

chinese: 这个男人在给手表估价。
english: The man is estimating the value of the watch

chinese: adv.因此
english: thereby

chinese: 他满十八岁了，因此可以进网吧了。
english: He turned 18, thereby it was legal for him to go into Internet cafes

chinese: 1人道主义，人文主义
english: humanism

chinese: 人文主义相信所有的知识都需要自己学习，而不是靠神赐予。
english: Humanism is the belief that all knowledge is self-taught, and not shared by gods

chinese: v.抑制，约束
english: inhibit

chinese: 把你的鼻子藏在衬衫里面会阻碍你的呼吸。
english: Hiding your nose behind the shirt will inhibit your breath

chinese: adj中立的n.中立国
english: neutral

chinese: 他在这场争吵中保持中立，不偏袒任何一方
english: He remained neutral in the disagreement, not taking either side

chinese: vi排队，排成一行 v.使成一直线
english: align

chinese: 所有车停放的位置都应与停车位对齐。
english: Every car in the lot should be aligned with each parking space

chinese: n.怀疑
english: suspicion

chinese: 这两人引起了警察的怀疑。
english: The two men raised the suspicion of the policeman

chinese: n.地点；场所；网站；现场 u给…选址
english: Site

chinese: 新的住宅区会选址在海边。
english: The site of the new development will be by the sea

chinese: （天灾、战争等造成的）大破坏，大毁灭 vi.损毁 vt. 严重破坏
english: havoc

chinese: 龙卷风对这座城市造成了极大的破坏。
english: The tornado has wreaked havoc on the city

chinese: Qd），巨大的；大规模的
english: massive

chinese: 这座巨大的雕像是四川有名的旅游景点。
english: The massive statue is a very popular tourist attraction in Sichuan Province

chinese: n.公司；团体组织
english: incorporation

chinese: 把一个花园并入这栋房子会提高房子的价格。
english: The incorporation of a garden will raise the price of the house
